name: fixtures_by_team_by_season
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool rugby_live_data.
Tool description: Rugby fixtures, results, standings and live match coverage from around the world.
API description: Retrieves fixtures and results for a given team within a specified season across all competitions they play in.

season_id.description: The ID of the season to retrieve fixtures and results for.

team_id.description: The ID of the team to retrieve fixtures and results for.
